title: Bladi 2
content:
I released Bladi 2 on [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151541/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/bladi-two-4f).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151541im_/http:/typophile.com/files/19393_5838.png)
  
This font based on [Bladi 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151541/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/bladi-one-4f)

Here is some screens from [Specimen PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151541/http:/cdn.myfonts.com/s/aw/original/37/0/19394.pdf)
